Dresden ist mit Ã¼ber 506.000 Einwohnern die zweitgrÃ¶ÃŸte Stadt Sachsens und auÃŸerdem das politische und kulturelle Zentrum des Freistaates. Es hat den Status einer kreisfreien Stadt, ist Sitz des Regierungsbezirks Dresden und zahlreicher Hochschulen. Den Rest des Tages habenwir dann damit verbracht, zu FuÃŸ die Stadt zu erkunden und zusÃ¤tzlich zu diesemeinige speziell herausgesuchte Caches zu machen.Â Die gesuchten Werte zu finden hat ja keine Probleme gemacht, undam Ende der Tour wollten wir dann diese Dose finden. Leider haben wir unszuhause nicht die letzten Logs angesehen, so mussten wir uns in die Riegederjenigen einreihen, die am Ende mit leeren HÃ¤nden dastanden.Netterweise hat uns der Owner nach Ãœbermittlung der Finalkoordinaten die Logfreigabe erteilt.Vielen Dank Noch einmal dafÃ¼r und fÃ¼r diese Runde, die uns gut gefallen hat.

weltengreif / 29.12.2016 / gefundenI recently decided that this holiday season it was time to finish off the Deutschlandtour series. Hence, first of all, a trip to beautiful Dresden was on the menu, in order to find #16. An overnight train ride brought me there, and, after a night in a B&B, this was my MO for the return journey. There was also a brief detour to the Czech Rep as well as some D5 business. The weather was pretty foul, particularly on the first day, so I was rather glad when I chanced upon an outdoor shop and was able to buy myself some rain trous - something I hadn't managed at home. There were also quite a considerable number of DNFs logged. However, the most irritating aspect of this trip were challenges with additional puzzles - though I can see how this may have helped owners avoid 161m conflicts (honi soit ...) All in all, it still ended up being a successful trip, and I still think I might move here one day.#16! Of course, this was the decisive factor for this trip to Dresden. The questions at the three stages were easily answered and the somewhat underwhelming final location arrived at. The micro had slipped out of reach, but of course I was equipped well enough to drag it out.And now to Nuremberg!TFTC!Cache #6060 (approx.)Found on 29. Dezember 2016 at 15:00
